oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Hardin County musicians conduct workshop at local junior high school
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Hardin County musicians Grady Lewis, Louis Young and Wayne Jerrolds (fiddle) conduct a workshop on country music at the Hardin County Junior High School, circa 1982.
Jerrolds was a Tennessee State Champion Fiddler. Note: Image is out of focus.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Lewis, Grady; Young, Louis; Jerrolds, Wayne
Music: old-time
Anglo-American
Folklife -- History -- Sources; Folklife -- 20th century -- Sources; Old-time music -- History -- Sources
